channel.title: Battlescape 317 - An old kind of fun
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][COLOR="#FFFF00"]Client Download -[/COLOR][/B] [url=http://up.ht/16iO3eO]http://up.ht/16iO3eO[/url]
[B][COLOR="#FFFF00"]Forums -[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Coming soon...[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FFFF00"][B]Double Exp for a limited time![/B][/COLOR]
[FONT=Verdana][COLOR="#00FFFF"][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dfwqm-QKKcg&list=UUyrB1v8S4RSNE_gwnfeH4WQ&index=13]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dfwqm-QKKcg&list=UUyrB1v8S4RSNE_gwnfeH4WQ&index=13[/url]
We've all long waited the return of 2007 era and have all given it an attempt. Though it's still as fun as it used to be, not all of us can spend hours upon hours grinding away.[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#00FFFF"]In 2009, Palidino hosted a server - Battlescape 317. It was the most popular server of it's time. It's main features included fully functional pest control, bossing, duel arena, functional quests, scrolls and 18 trainable skills.[/COLOR]
[SPOILER=Bosses] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=9W4N6-BJ754]BattleScape Dagg Kings.. - YouTube[/url]
[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=PK-ing] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ySm5kWPIPVI&list=UUyrB1v8S4RSNE_gwnfeH4WQ&index=9]V Control V's First Battlescape pk vid - YouTube[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7D9h7rP7_LQ&list=UU1UOmWC0wjmdQHPxtVOshhg&index=124]I Blade I presents: Fatal Uprising Pk Vid #1 - Battlescape 317 - YouTube[/url]
[/SPOILER]
[COLOR="#00FFFF"]I will update this thread a little later, still working out some bugs and glitches.[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/30accnc.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/ilc9bq.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/303kebc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/241v0bb.png[/img][/FONT][/CENTER]
